metadata.title: CVE-2021-45960 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
In Expat (aka libexpat) before 2.4.3, a left shift by 29 (or more) places in the storeAtts function in xmlparse.c can lead to realloc misbehavior (e.g., allocating too few bytes, or only freeing memory).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-45960` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

expat - 2.4.1-2ubuntu0.1
libexpat1 - 2.4.1-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

firefox - 98.0+build3-0ubuntu0.21.10.2
firefox-geckodriver - 98.0+build3-0ubuntu0.21.10.2
firefox-mozsymbols - 98.0+build3-0ubuntu0.21.10.2
No subscription required

notes.note: sbeattie> paraview uses system expat xotcl uses system expat poco uses system expat gdcm uses system expat audacity uses system expat simgear uses system expat coin3 uses system expat as of 4.0.0~CMake~6f54f1602475+ds1-1 sitecopy uses system expat since 1:0.16.0-1 (dapper!) rodrigo-zaiden> libxmltok does not include nsAttsPower, so, not affected.

criterions.comment: cadaver package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
expat package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.1-2ubuntu0.1').
firefox package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '98.0+build3-0ubuntu0.21.10.2').
insighttoolkit4 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
matanza package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
swish-e package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
tdom package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
wbxml2 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
xmlrpc-c package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
